articles.description: The Edinburgh show on September 1 sold out in seconds.
articles.content:
Lewis Capaldi has announced a huge second outdoor show in Edinburgh this August due to overwhelming demand, with McFly added to the line up.
The Glasgow-based global star sold out his upcoming 2023 … [+617 chars]

articles.author: Helen Kelly
articles.title: Naga Munchetty caught moving away from BBC Breakfast co-star after 'awkward' reunion - Express
articles.description: Naga Munchetty and Charlie Stayt were reunited with Owain Wyn Evans on BBC Breakfast to talk about his new Radio 2 show.
